text:
Shares of Alphabet Inc. Cl A 
        GOOGL,
        +0.04%
       slipped 0.46% to $150.07 Monday, on what proved to be an all-around grim trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index 
        SPX,
        +0.11%
       falling 0.31% to 5,218.19 and Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.12%
       falling 0.41% to 39,313.64. Alphabet Inc. Cl A closed $3.71 short of its 52-week high ($153.78), which the company reached on January 29th. The stock demonstrated a mixed performance when compared to some of its competitors Monday, as Microsoft Corp. 
        MSFT,
        -0.17%
       fell 1.37% to $422.86, Amazon.com Inc. 
        AMZN,
        +0.31%
       rose 0.47% to $179.71, and Meta Platforms Inc. 
        META,
        -1.68%
       fell 1.29% to $503.02. Trading volume (19.1 M) remained 13.8 million below its 50-day average volume of 33.0 M.
